name: CVE-2017-0290
description: The Microsoft Malware Protection Engine running on Microsoft Forefront and Microsoft Defender on Microsoft Windows Server 2008 SP2 and R2 SP1, Windows 7 SP1, Windows 8.1, Windows Server 2012 Gold and R2, Windows RT 8.1, Windows 10 Gold, 1511, 1607, and 1703, and Windows Server 2016 does not properly scan a specially crafted file leading to memory corruption, aka "Microsoft Malware Protection Engine Remote Code Execution Vulnerability."
pattern: [((software:cpe='cpe:2.3:a:microsoft:forefront_security:-:*:*:*:*:*:*:*' OR software:cpe='cpe:2.3:a:microsoft:malware_protection_engine:*:*:*:*:*:*:*:*' OR software:cpe='cpe:2.3:a:microsoft:windows_defender:-:*:*:*:*:*:*:*') AND (software:cpe='cpe:2.3:o:microsoft:windows_server_2012:-:gold:*:*:*:*:*:*' OR software:cpe='cpe:2.3:o:microsoft:windows_server_2012:r2:*:*:*:*:*:*:*' OR software:cpe='cpe:2.3:o:microsoft:windows_10:1511:*:*:*:*:*:*:*' OR software:cpe='cpe:2.3:o:microsoft:windows_10:1607:*:*:*:*:*:*:*' OR software:cpe='cpe:2.3:o:microsoft:windows_server_2016:-:*:*:*:*:*:*:*' OR software:cpe='cpe:2.3:o:microsoft:windows_8.1:*:*:*:*:*:*:*:*' OR software:cpe='cpe:2.3:o:microsoft:windows_server_2008:-:sp2:*:*:*:*:*:*' OR software:cpe='cpe:2.3:o:microsoft:windows_server_2008:r2:sp1:*:*:*:*:*:*' OR software:cpe='cpe:2.3:o:microsoft:windows_7:-:sp1:*:*:*:*:*:*' OR software:cpe='cpe:2.3:o:microsoft:windows_rt_8.1:-:*:*:*:*:*:*:*' OR software:cpe='cpe:2.3:o:microsoft:windows_10:1703:*:*:*:*:*:*:*' OR software:cpe='cpe:2.3:o:microsoft:windows_10:-:*:*:*:*:*:*:*'))]
